title: ASL 3.5 ‚Äî Feelings & Reactions üòäüòÆüò°
objectives: Express core feelings with appropriate NMM intensity (HAPPY, SAD, ANGRY, SURPRISED, SCARED, EXCITED, TIRED)
Ask/answer HOW-FEEL? and WHY? with clear WH-face and short reasons
React to news with supportive moves (I SEE, SORRY, WOW, PROUD) and brief follow-ups

vocab.term: HAPPY / SAD / ANGRY / SURPRISED / SCARED / EXCITED / TIRED
vocab.def: Emotion set; show intensity via NMMs
WH-question; FEEL + HOW with brows down
WH-question for reasons; pair with BECAUSE/REASON
Short cause clause (e.g., BECAUSE HOMEWORK LOT)
Empathy or praise reactions; match face to message
Scale strength with NMM: eyebrows, mouth, body lean
Brows up for Y/N, brows down for WH

sections.heading: Warm-Up: Emotion Scale
sections.body: Drill **HAPPY, SAD, ANGRY, SURPRISED, SCARED, EXCITED, TIRED** at **low/medium/high** intensity. Keep hands compact; let the **face** do most of the work.

callouts.title: Clarity
callouts.body: Keep signs small; let NMM carry emotion strength.

sections.heading: Model: HOW-FEEL? + Reason
sections.body:
Frames:
‚Ä¢ **TODAY YOU HOW-FEEL?** (WH-face)
‚Ä¢ **I FEEL EXCITED BECAUSE GAME TONIGHT.**
‚Ä¢ **I FEEL SAD REASON HOMEWORK LOT.** Keep reasons short (3‚Äì5 signs).
sections.teacherNote: Coach a tiny pause before BECAUSE/REASON to increase readability.

sections.heading: React to News: Support Moves
sections.body:
Use quick reactions + one follow-up:
‚Ä¢ **WOW! I SEE.** **WHY?**
‚Ä¢ **SORRY.** **NEED HELP?** (Y/N face)
‚Ä¢ **PROUD YOU.** **TELL-ME MORE.** Keep turns compact.

callouts.title: Mini Ladders
callouts.body: Bad news: **SORRY. I SEE. YOU WANT HELP?**  Good news: **WOW! NICE. PROUD YOU.**

sections.heading: Partner Practice: Feelings & Reasons

media.alt: Partner exchange of feelings and reactions
media.caption: Swap every 20‚Äì30s

sections.body: A asks **TODAY YOU HOW-FEEL?** B answers with feeling + short reason. A reacts with **I SEE / SORRY / WOW** + one follow-up (**WHY?**, **YOU WANT HELP?**). Switch roles; vary intensity.

callouts.title: Feedback Stem
callouts.body: ‚ÄúYour sign was clear‚Äîtry **more face** for intensity, **smaller hands** for control.‚Äù

sections.heading: Mini-Showcase
sections.body: Record **10‚Äì15s**: 1 feeling + reason + partner reaction. Example: **I FEEL SURPRISED BECAUSE TEST EASY.** ‚Üí **WOW NICE!**
sections.teacherNote: Allow privacy submissions; caption should name your **intensity level** and **follow-up** choice.
